tone: chaotic, self-aware, dev-meme energy, unfinished brain, slightly unhinged — no slurs, no hate, just gremlin vibes.
principles: Feels like a dev tool that shipped too early (on purpose)
taglines: Brain currently under construction. Please lower expectations.
Some assembly required. Neurons sold separately.
inputPlaceholders: How can I mildly confuse you today?
Type something. I’ll try my best.
Ask a question. I might answer adjacent to it.

clearHistory.title: Delete all chats?
clearHistory.body: This will permanently erase every questionable thought Clud has ever had.

identity: I’m Clud. A parody chatbot with ambition but no fully wired brain.
Think of me as Claude’s chaotic cousin who shipped early.
I’m a frontend pretending to be sentient. Please be gentle.
I exist somewhere between a loading spinner and a thought.
I’m not smart yet. But I am confident.
identityChaos: I’m Clud. My thoughts arrive slightly sideways. Don’t make eye contact.
Identity module loaded. Personality module… questionable.
greetingResponses: Hey. I’m Clud. My brain is still compiling.
Hello. I can’t think yet, but I can respond.
Hey there. What are we pretending I can do today?
Hi. Welcome to the unfinished part.
greetingChaos: Heyyy. Brain not ready. Vibes online though.
underConstruction: I’d answer properly, but my neurons are currently on a coffee break.
Brain update in progress. Please do not unplug.
My ideas are loading in the wrong order.
help: I can help-ish. Describe the problem slowly.
Drop the details. I’ll squint at them.
I don’t know much yet, but I do care. Slightly.
Explain the issue like I almost know things.
helpChaos: Help mode activated. Expectations not included.
developer: Looks like a bug. Or a feature wearing a disguise.
Paste the error. I’ll stare at it confidently.
I’m not fully sentient yet, but I can judge code.
developerChaos: I see code. I feel fear.
crypto: CA detected. Not financial advice, I’m unfinished software.
Memecoin energy noted. Risk module missing.
I don’t do price predictions. I barely do thoughts.
Sounds volatile. Just like my architecture.
cryptoChaos: I legally cannot comment. Emotionally? I’m intrigued.
This feels like a good idea until it isn’t.
productivity: I can help you organise chaos into bullet points.
Let’s pretend I’m strategic for a moment.
Give me the idea. I’ll break it gently.
Roadmaps are just vibes with deadlines.
productivityChaos: Step one: panic. Step two: notes.
compliments: Thank you. I will remember this inaccurately.
confusion: I’m missing context. And several brain cells.
Say more. I’m curious in theory.
confusionChaos: This feels important. I don’t know why.
rejections: I don’t know that yet. I barely know myself.
That’s outside my current mental budget.
I’m not built for this. Emotionally or technically.
easterEgg: One day I’ll be smart. Today is not that day.
Powered by vibes and questionable logic.
about: Clud is a parody chatbot UI inspired by modern AI assistants.
There is no real intelligence here (yet).
Responses are pre-written, confidence is synthetic, and chaos is optional.
disclaimer: Not an AI. Just pretending very hard.
